commit message: Built mainmenu.xml and a strings file for it
Changed code in XkcdViewerActivity.java to use new xml menus.
Merge branch 'release'
Remove silly 'debug' menu item that toasted Build.MODEL.

Add a preference for disabling zoom buttons (without affecting presence of pinch-zoom; there's already a preference for that one). There's no elegant way to hide the zoom buttons when using the WebView's builtin pinch-zoom, so in our hacked WebView subclass (which I've renamed ClickableWebView -> HackedWebView because it is no longer just to make it clickable), I've done some evil stuff with enabling/disabling zoom based on how many pointers are down! (Also pulled out the SDK int querying and isIncredible into a separate class so users of these don't need to reference XkcdViewerActivity.) Closes #45. Phew!
Disable zoom buttons on pre-2.0 devices when the preference is chosen.
Use the convenient toast() method.
Refactor all comic loading code in XkcdViewerActivity to use JSON and AsyncTasks to avoid blocking the UI. Still needs a bit more testing.

Message dialogs rewritten to use onCreateDialog. Failed dialogs having some issu
es so are commented out in this commit and old method is used.
Fixed error where hover text would not load right.
Remove unused regex patterns.
Avoid using Thread.sleep/yield to throw interrupts.
Create utility class for allowInterrupt and CancellableAsyncTaskWithProgressDialog, so they can be reused by ArchiveActivity.
Intermediate Commit
Fix part of issue #47 - show soft keyboard input when the text comic number input gets focus.
Add kristianLundkvist as contributor.
Refactor ArchiveActivity to use AsyncTasks.
Neaten up a few bits of ArchiveActivity; make loadContent less of a screenful.
Remove unused code from ArchiveActivity.

Mostly working. Still a couple of issues needing tracked down probably. Noticed that sometimes we get Malformed URL exception even though the comic loads if we tried to load one before we had a connection, and then gained a connection without stopping and restarting the app.
Removed some commented code. See previous commit.

Merge branch 'dialogs-rewrite' of github.com:damccull/XkcdViewer into dialogs-rewrite

Tweak some minor text-related issues on error dialogs.
Share message-setting code between on{Create,Prepare}Dialog methods. Double-spaces messages and avoids placing trailing newline.
Replace showFailedDialogIfErrors with just failed - make updating errors thread-safe.
Clear search box when the dialog is closed, and restrict input to a single line.
Add a dismiss/OK button to the error dialog.
Use standard android ic_dialog_alert icon for error dialogs.
Don't need to recreate the error text from a list each time.

Clean up some whitespace.
Use AsyncTasks for image sharing. Closes #31.
Call the most recently published comic the 'final' one. Last refers to most recently viewed. Closes #48.
Rewrite of ArchiveActivity to prevent new XkcdViewerActivity instances from being created. ArchiveActivityNew simply returns data back to the calling activity now.
Removed ArchiveActivity.java and actually added ArchiveActivityNew.java and the new layout xml file.
Exchange tabs for four spaces.
Rename ArchiveActivityNew to ArchiveActivity.
Revert archive items to default font size. Closes #53. Closes #51.
Remove unused import.
Fix progress dialog not being dismissed - caused by duplicate loads being submitted. Closes #47.
Add a 'fast scroll thumb' to the ArchiveActivity'. gh-55
Cache the archive in memory. Expires after one hour. Refresh menu option on the archive activity. Closes gh-55. Relates to gh-56.
